Topic.Title: Make a backup of your game

Posts.EditableText:
Like you haven't been told before about 100 times.
I got out of the habit of making backups and just had a power surge/outage while working on a game I had months into. Now the aslx file just says NUL about 150,000 times. Bummed yes but now I can rewrite a better version from scratch. 

Look at me being positive...and backing up again.
